# CODE OF CONDUCT
## How to behave
  forbidden things:
  
  -Sending NSFW messages.
  
  -Publishing private information about others without having the EXPLICIT and WRITTEN permission of the owner of that information.
  
  -Being toxic.
  
## reporting

If you want to report please send an email to PunishmentManager@gmail.com

# disclaimer
THESE RULES CAN BE MODIFIED WITHOUT WARNING OR NOTICE AT ANY GIVEN TIME!
